title: Can't connect to games
body: My league doesn't connect to games, champ select ends and it just sits there. Last time this happened I got a warning so If I miss out on rewards because your game doesnt work I will be mad

replies.body:
>If I miss out on rewards

Last I checked, leaving games or just being placed in low priority queue was not considered to be a "temporary ban or chat restriction", so you should retain your reward eligibility.

Hi,

Check out [the sticky thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/WlGElu7g-update-firewall-error-after-champion-select) for some info on the problems you are experiencing.

-Mindstar
